headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.walletconnect.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: *.walletconnect.com https://*.githubusercontent.com https://*.coinbase.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.walletconnect.com https://*.walletconnect.org wss://*.walletconnect.com wss://*.walletconnect.org https://rpc.walletconnect.com https://*.infura.io https://*.alchemy.com; frame-src *.walletconnect.com; child-src 'none'; font-src 'self';
